description: The Teddy Bear® Magnolia tree is a stunning and unique species, boasting beautiful large white blooms and deep green foliage. It's a perfect choice for those looking for an eye-catching display in their gardens. Its moderate growth rate, compact size and drought tolerance make it an ideal candidate for urban landscapes or smaller gardens. The flowers emit a delicious vanilla fragrance, which is sweet and alluring. This tree is resistant to pests and diseases, and its glossy evergreen leaves help it stand out, even during winter. This distinctive species is perfect for making any garden or landscape come alive.
